name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-da-typespec-todo
title: Tasks Agent using TypeSpec for Microsoft 365 Copilot that connects to the Microsoft Graph APIs
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to build a declarative agent for Microsoft 365 Copilot using TypeSpec for Microsoft 365 Copilot that connects to the Tasks endpoints of the Microsoft Graph API through an API plugin.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to build a declarative agent for Microsoft 365 Copilot using TypeSpec for Microsoft 365 Copilot that connects to the Tasks endpoints of the Microsoft Graph API through an API plugin.

thumbnails.alt: Declarative agent that shows overdue issues
Declarative agent that shows a new task
